scripts.build:all: bun run build:sdk && bun run build:server:api && bun run build:server:state
scripts.dev:client:web_babylon_js: export VRCA_CLIENT_WEB_BABYLON_JS_DEBUG_SESSION_TOKEN=$(bun run server:postgres:system-token true) && bun run install:sdk && bun run build:sdk && bun run clean:client:web_babylon_js && bun run install:client:web_babylon_js && bun vircadia.cli.ts client:set-uri && cd ../client/web_babylon_js/ && bun --env-file=.env run dev
scripts.test:1_db_unit: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_state_manager && bun test ./test/1_test_db_unit.ts && bun run server:run-command up vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_state_manager -d
scripts.server:init: bun run build:server:api && bun run build:server:state && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_postgres -d && bun run server:postgres:health && bun run server:postgres:migrate && bun run server:postgres:seed:sql && bun run server:postgres:seed:assets && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_state_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_pgweb -d
scripts.server:rebuild-all: bun run server:run-command down -v && bun run server:init
scripts.server:health-all: bun run server:world-api-manager:health && bun run server:world-state-manager:health && bun run server:pgweb:health && bun run server:postgres:health
scripts.server:postgres:backup: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun vircadia.cli.ts server:postgres:backup && bun run server:run-command up -d
scripts.server:postgres:restore: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun vircadia.cli.ts server:postgres:restore && bun run server:run-command up -d
scripts.server:postgres:reset: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_state_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun run server:postgres:wipe && bun run server:postgres:migrate && bun run server:postgres:seed:sql && bun run server:postgres:seed:assets && bun run server:run-command up -d
